home.title: Get Your Professional Resume
home.subtitle: Let AI help optimize your content, match job requirements, and enhance your resume's impact. Smart keyword analysis and professional templates ensure you stand out.

footer.description: {name} is a NextJS template for building AI SaaS startups, with rich templates and components for quick launch.

hero.title: What is {name}
hero.description: Use AI technology to make your resume more professional and competitive. Support multiple format exports, smart layout, and automatic optimization based on job requirements.

export.title: Multiple Formats
export.description: Support md/pdf/png formats to meet different resume submission needs.

adjust.title: Auto Adjustment
adjust.description: Adjust resume content based on different job descriptions to improve matching.

onepage.title: Smart One Page
onepage.description: Elegant layout, smart content adjustment to ensure one-page resume.
